comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: This machine (J-BACI named Nippon) was a Mutsubishi G3M2 transport variant which did a round the world flight between August 26, 1939 till October 20, 1939. The world flight was sponsored by the Japanese newspaper MAINICHI SHINBUN (translated as DAILY NEWS). More can be found on www.vectorsite.net/avg4m.html
